item.title: FT Most Read: Friday, June 14, 2024 at 9:15 AM UTC
item.description:
1. Wells Fargo fires workers for ‘simulating’ being at their keyboards
2. Nigel Farage’s Reform UK overtakes Conservatives in new opinion poll
3. Tesla shareholders approve Elon Musk’s record pay deal and move to Texas
4. Starmer sets out plans to raise £8.6bn in tax in Labour manifesto
5. Macron’s party at risk of wipeout as left forms unity pact
item.guid: FT Most Read: Friday, June 14, 2024 at 9:15 AM UTC
